function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging people to spend more time outdoors in green spaces may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to prolonged outdoor exposure.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) such as masks and hand sanitizer while outdoors in green spaces.","Technologies":"Development of wearable technology for monitoring and alerting individuals of potential exposure risks in green spaces.","People":"General population, outdoor enthusiasts, and individuals seeking mental and physical restoration in green spaces.","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments, and urban planners."},{"Description":"Promoting physical activities in green spaces may lead to increased social interaction and close proximity, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Elevated risk of contagious disease transmission during physical activities in green spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures in green spaces and promote outdoor activities that minimize close contact.","Technologies":"Use of crowd monitoring and management technologies to regulate the density and movements of people in green spaces.","People":"Exercise enthusiasts, individuals seeking physical health improvements, and communities utilizing green spaces for recreational activities.","Owner":"Local governments, fitness and recreation organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Enhanced social cohesion and cooperation in green spaces may result in larger gatherings and social events, increasing the potential for contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission during social gatherings in green spaces.","Mitigation":"Establish guidelines for safe social gatherings and events in green spaces, and promote responsible behavior to minimize transmission risks.","Technologies":"Utilize event management and crowd coordination technologies to plan and monitor social gatherings in green spaces.","People":"Community members, event organizers, and individuals participating in social activities in green spaces.","Owner":"Local authorities, event planners, and community organizations."}]}
